entry.title: FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT, Alliston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:06 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Borden 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: WNW 22 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero with patchy frost. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low zero with patchy frost. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2 with risk of frost. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Low plus 2 with risk of frost. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 15 May 2016
